here's the problem '20 minutes'
They are buffs you are not supposed to unlock until 15-20 min as they are made for after laning not during

I assume having a permanent shield during laning phase would be a bit unbalanced, especially if I'm taking colossus as well, which is why they made it so you wouldn't probably gain it until laning phase is ending
